certificates.name: EE.08
certificates.fullName: Installation and operation of computer systems, peripheral devices and networks
certificates.description: The EE.08 certificate validates my skills in assembling, configuring, and maintaining computer systems, peripheral devices, and local networks. I have hands-on experience with hardware installation, system setup, troubleshooting, and network management, enabling me to ensure efficient operation and maintenance of IT infrastructure.

certificates.name: EE.09
certificates.fullName: Programming, creating and administration of websites and databases
certificates.description: The EE.09 certificate validates my skills in application programming, database creation and management, as well as designing and deploying websites and web applications. I have hands-on experience with SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP and CMS platforms, enabling me to effectively manage data and deliver web projects.
